entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story who is still feeling shame and guilt about an article written by Rita Skeeter.

entities.name: rita skeeter
entities.description: A journalist who wrote an article that hurt Harry's feelings and made him feel ashamed.

entities.name: durmstrang champions
entities.description: The champions from Durmstrang school who were mentioned in the article.

entities.name: beauxbatons
entities.description: A school that was mentioned as one of the schools participating in a tournament.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: A person who was not mentioned in the article, but is likely a character from the story.

relationships.description: Rita Skeeter reported on Harry's words and actions, which hurt his feelings and made him feel ashamed.
Harry gets his strength from his parents who are watching over him.
